metadata.name: Looking for Ludovico
metadata.description:
This mod will tell you if the Item 'The Ludovico Technique' is present at any treasure room of a level. The source code of this mod can be found at [url=https://github.com/dpv927/LookingForLudovico]GitHub[/url].
[h1]Features[/h1] [list] [*] When the item is found, a message will be displayed near the player and Isaac will do the thumbs up emote. [*] The message will not disappear unless the player moves to another room. [/list]
[h1]Fixes (Version 1.6)[/h1] [list] [*] Somehow, some adjacent rooms to the treasure rooms still showed up in the map. This is now fixed. [*] This mod caused the golden treasure room in Greed mode to stay open and does not seem to be a primitive solution. Therefore, Greed mode won't be supported by this mod until this issue is solved. [/list]
